Package com.atakmap.android.video.manager

Class VideoManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.video.manager.VideoManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    public class VideoManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disposable
    Class responsible for managing video aliases persisted to the filesystem

      • removeEntry

        public void removeEntry​(java.lang.String uid)
        Remove an entry from the cache and file system Note that this will remove non-remote videos as well
        Parameters:
        uid - Connection entry UID

      • removeEntry

        public void removeEntry​(ConnectionEntry entry)
        Removes an entry from both the filesystem and the local in memory list.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to be removed.

      • removeEntries

      • getXMLHandler

        public VideoXMLHandler getXMLHandler()
        Get the video XML handler used by the manager Using this handler over a newly created one prevents sync issues when reading and writing entries
        Returns:
        XML handler
